name: playMOTU
description:
Welcome to #playMOTU Masters of the Universe, a He-Man pixel style, platformer game I wish I had back in the late 80s. 

My name is Shaun Ayala and I’m a beginner game developer creating a retro style He-Man game that takes you on an adventure of the 1980s TV show Masters of the Universe. 

In this Demo, you'll be able to experience a small playable level filled with a few puzzles and surprises from a specific episode in season 1.

 If you're a He-Man fan or simply love pixel games, I would love your thoughts and feedback.

Follow me on Twitter and  Instagram  to stay updated: @playMOTU

Or stay updated via email at www.playMOTU.com
